walkthroughs.title: TestDriver Walkthrough
walkthroughs.description:
Test your app with a computer-use agent in minutes.
This walkthrough will show you how to set up TestDriver and run your first test.

steps.title: Set up TestDriver
steps.description:
Install & configure TestDriver in the active workspace via NPM .
[Run Setup](command:testdriver.init)

steps.title: Chat with TestDriver
steps.description:
You can talk to testdrivery by tagging them in chat. 
[Open Chat](command:workbench.action.chat.open)

steps.title: Build your first test
steps.description:
Type `@testdriverai /try click on the menu bar` in the chat window. TestDriver will execute the commands and make a new test file.
[Try it out](command:testdriver.try)

steps.title: Run your test
steps.description:
Type `@testdriverai /try click on the menu bar` in the chat window. TestDriver will execute the commands and make a new test file.
[Run All Tests](command:testing.runAll)

steps.title: Automatically generate tests
steps.description:
TsetDriver can automatically generate tests by looking at the screen..
[Start Walkthrough](command:testdriver.walkthroughGenerate)

walkthroughs.title: TestDriver Generation Walkthrough
walkthroughs.description: Automatically generate multiple tests by asking TestDriver to explore your app.

steps.title: Open a Terminal
steps.description:
Open a terminal in VS Code..
[Open Terminal](command:workbench.action.terminal.new)

steps.title: Run TestDriver CLI
steps.description:
Run the TestDriver cli in your terminal by typing `testdriver` and pressing enter..
[Run TestDriver CLI](command:workbench.action.terminal.sendSequence?%7B%22text%22%3A%22testdriverai%20%5Cn%22%7D)

steps.title: Run TestDriver Generate
steps.description:
Run the TestDriver web test by typing `web 5` in the terminal. TestDriver will create new test prompts in `testdriver/generate` folder.
[Run Explore Command](command:workbench.action.terminal.sendSequence?%7B%22text%22%3A%22%2Fgenerate%20web%205%5Cn%22%7D)

steps.title: Run the generated tests
steps.description:
TestDriver will use the prompts in the test file to complete the regression test.
[Run All Tests](command:testing.runAll)

steps.title: Deployment Walkthrough
steps.description:
Follow the deployment walkthrough to deploy your new tests to GitHub actions!.
[Start Walkthrough](command:testdriver.walkthroughDeploy)

walkthroughs.title: TestDriver Deployment Walkthrough
walkthroughs.description: Learn how to run your tests within GitHub actions.

steps.title: Create a new branch
steps.description:
Use `git checkout -b testdriver` to make a new branch.
[Create Branch](command:git.branch)

steps.title: Stage your changes
steps.description:
Stage your changes with `git add .`.
[Stage All Changes](command:git.stageAll)

steps.title: Commit your changes
steps.description:
Commit your changes with `git commit -m 'your message'`.
[Commit Changes](command:git.commit)

steps.title: Sync .env with GitHub secrets
steps.description: Run the `upload-secrets` command to set your API Key and Website  URL in GitHub secrets. [Run Secret Sync](command:workbench.action.terminal.sendSequence?%7B%22text%22%3A%22testdriverai%20upload-secrets%5Cn%22%7D)

steps.title: Push your changes
steps.description:
Type `git push` in terminal to upload your new test files.
[Push Changes](command:git.push)

steps.title: Watch your test runs!
steps.description:
Your test will now run everyday and on new pull requests.
[Learn More](command:workbench.action.openUrl?%7B%22url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.testdriver.ai%22%7D)
